Tracer.CTB: Cholera Toxin B subunit / Cholera Toxin Subunit-B (CTB; 1%
Tracer.DY/NY: Diamidino yellow combined with nuclear yellow
Tracer.Thymidine: Thymidine analog / Deoxythymidine / Deoxyribosylthymine / Thymine deoxyriboside
Tracer.WGA-HRP: Wheat germ agglutinin conjugated to horseradish peroxidase
